title: June 10 Security Android 10 update killed my Pixel 3 XL
content:
Phone was working until i did June 10 security update for Android 10.  Now i have zero wifi or cellular radio options.  Ive spent hours troubleshooting. I eventually factory reset the phone.  And guess what?  It kept android 10 even though i did factory reset!!!   So it kept the problem. 

So now i have a a non internet or mobile device.
